Class WildCatScreen

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.screens.WildCatScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, ScreenState
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameScreen, IntroScreen, MainMenuScreen
public abstract class WildCatScreen extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, ScreenState
Abstract class representing a screen in the game that implements both the Screen and ScreenState interfaces. It provides basic methods for screen management, including resizing, pausing, resuming, and hiding screens. Subclasses must define the behavior for rendering, showing, and disposing of the screen.
